column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Our waiter doesn't bother to stop at our table until 9:15 PM
column2: so we have had a 15 minute wait. Not good considering this guy literally circled our table about four times before stopping at our table. Maybe he got dizzy from circling so much
column5: which do not come until 9:30. I had the Sazerac
column6: which was a little strong; it was clear that the bartender had a slight overpour. However
column7: the drink wasn't bad because of the slight overpour. The drink was bad because the bartender gave me so little of it in the glass. Not good.
